long_description: Great for everyday wear, the Teva Neota sandals offer versatile performance and excellent comfort whether you're trekking around the park or the globe. Highly adjustable waterproof nubuck leather straps feature rip-and-stick tabs across forefeet, insteps and heels to ensure a secure, comfortable and custom fit. Neoprene backs the straps for added comfort; moisture-wicking nylon stretch-mesh linings are soft against bare skin and dry quickly. Contoured topsoles feature moisture-wicking polyester microfiber and an antimicrobial treatment to help deter odors and enhance underfoot comfort. Compression-molded EVA midsoles with encapsulated polyurethane Shoc Pads(TM) in heels supply cushioning, shock absorption and support. Nylon shanks provide torsional support for enhanced stability on uneven terrain. Durable rubber outsoles on the Teva Neota sandals grip supply reliable traction on most surfaces.
short_description: Great for everyday wear, the Teva Neota sandals offer versatile performance and excellent comfort whether you're trekking around the park or the globe.
